events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your background and experience.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application process.
The initial screening interview went well, and the recruiter was impressed with your technical knowledge and communication.
Thank you for your prompt response and interest in proceeding to the technical interview stage for the engineering role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for May 7th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and deep software knowledge.
An HR interview has been scheduled for you on May 10th to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career aspirations.
The HR interview went positively, with the recruiter highlighting your enthusiasm and alignment with company values.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including salary and benefits details for your review.
Thank you for your positive feedback and acceptance of the offer; we are excited to welcome you to our engineering team.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we will now begin the onboarding process to get you started smoothly.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and access setup planned for your first day in the engineering department.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with you onboard as a valued member of our engineering team.
